title: ↪ 📱 3/2 Available For Short Term August BRICKELL: Ready To Move In  Furnish
posting_body: ['REF# 10R109', '$6300 · Brickell · 1416 Sqft · Furnished · 3/2 · One Miami East Condo', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Available for short term August 1st through Nov 10th 2022.', 'Available again for one year lease as of Dec 1st.', 'Spectacular wide open views of the water from this 3 bedroom unit at One Miami.', 'Water views from every single room, parquet Floors, tasteful finishes and built ins make this the perfect residence in the heart of Miami!', 'You can have it all here!.', 'Two wonderful swimming pools, solarium, two gyms, direct access to I95 and ten minutes to the airport, safe and friendly environment and an elevator ride to Il Gabbiano, the best Italian restaurant in town.', "It won't last!.", 'Available for one year or less.', 'Cable and Internet are included.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 10R109', 'tags:', "parc lofts, onyx on the bay, two tequesta point, onyx on the bay, skyline on brickell, two midtown, wind by neo, two tequesta point, ocean view, 900 biscayne, the bond, icon brickell, grove square condo, le parc at brickell, bayfront homes in miami, brickell east condo, biscayne beach, brickell ten condo, brickellhouse, solaris at brickell, the sail condo, courtyards of the grove, brickell city centre - rise, venetia condo, aria on the bay, 1060 brickell, grove hill towers, sls lux brickell, st louis condo, l'hermitage, havana lofts condo, axis on brickell,, madison downtown condo, the plaza", '_mr10']
